code: import React from'react';import{useParams,useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import API from'../api';import'../Styles.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function DeleteUser(){const{userId}=useParams();const navigate=useNavigate();const handleDelete=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{await API.delete("users/".concat(userId,"/"));alert("User deleted successfully!");navigate('/admin/users');}catch(error){alert("Failed to delete user.");console.error(error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"room-card",style:{maxWidth:'500px',margin:'100px auto',padding:'30px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Confirm Deletion"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Are you sure you want to delete this user?"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleDelete,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",style:{backgroundColor:'red',color:'white'},children:"Delete"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"/admin/users",className:"btn",style:{backgroundColor:'#ccc',marginLeft:'10px'},children:"Cancel"})]})]});}export default DeleteUser;
